events.message: I have just filed a claim for the car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon on the highway.
The claim for the vehicle collision has been reviewed and categorised under auto accident claims.
An agent has been assigned to manage your car accident insurance claim moving forward.
We have formally acknowledged receipt of your vehicle collision claim and are beginning the processing steps.
Please submit photos of the damaged car and a copy of the police report regarding the auto accident.
All requested documents, including police report and vehicle photos, have been submitted for review.
The investigation into the cause and extent of the car accident damage has officially begun.
The investigation is now complete, with a detailed report assessing the vehicle damage and liability.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the vehicle assessment and policy terms.
The customer has provided positive feedback regarding the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement.
Your car accident insurance claim has been approved and the settlement amount finalized.
The payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to your designated bank account.
Your claim for the vehicle collision has now been closed following successful settlement payment.
All records related to your auto accident insurance claim have been archived for future reference.
